_header: High and almighty Creator of all
_description: A penitential prayer — 7 stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
Hyghe & almyghty creator of alleSpyryte of lyff & gyffer of
                    gladnes…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…Mekelye we pray & make vs clene of synneAftur þis
                    lyff and endelesse to be gynne
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by 
                    Iain
                    Fenlon. 
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
